content.detailedDescription:
Traveling northbound on eglin parkway almost to the intersection of racetrack road and eglin parkway, we noticed several really bright red-orange lights sitting stationary due north towards eglin afb/ crestview.  lights were bright and abnormal enough for us (and another car in front of us) to pull off the road into a parking lot to watch.  we watched for about 10 minutes. they did not mov.  then, they faded out.  
we went home (about a block away) at the foot of the shalier bridge.  we went out on our back deck, and the lights re-appeared.  we watched again for approx 30 minutes.  when they faded out, it seemed as though the row of lights went out one at a time.  there was also clouds in the sky.  when the clouds passed in front of the objects, it lit up the clouds.  
lights were very bright.  
about a week later (we were out of town), a few of our friends and family observed the same lights in the same vicinity.
content.summary: Static orange glowing lights at approx 2-3 miles away

content.detailedDescription: I saw 2 green blinking lights hovering about 500-1000ft above route 78 near straustown pa. i watched them for about 90 secs then as i was approaching the area that seemed to be directly below them the lights vanished. i drive this way home every night and have never seen green lights in the sky. im not sure ive ever seen green lights used on any tower. i initially thought it was a plane but then i realized they werent moving. ive been following ufology for several years and have never once actually had a siting of my own. im about 90% shore that has changed tonight.
content.summary: I saw 2 green blink lights hovering above route 78 near straustown pa, they then vanished abruptly

content.detailedDescription:
I'll make this short as possible!  on tues., march 27, 2012 around 6:03 am, i took my dog outside for his morning potty break.  while waiting on him in my front yard, i looked to the sky as usual.  movement of a fairly large yellowish-white light flying from west to east caught my eye.  there was no noise, no cloud cover, and the sky was clear with some stars still visible, and the eastern sky was just beginning to lighten at bit.  (however, i could hear that the birds were beginning to softly chirp in the neighborhood.)  as this "object" got closer, the yellowish-white light turned out to be nine squarish to rectangular shaped soft glowing, yellowish-white lights in an upside down cross shape or formation. as they passed right over me (maybe several thousand feet above me??), the only way i can describe what i saw is this:  the rectangular lights were arranged uniformly, two side by side in the 1st row, two side by side in the 2nd row, three side by side in the 3rd row (these 3 lights were a little longer than the others, with a little more space before and after them), and two side by side in the 4th row.  like i stated, the color was a soft, yellowish-white glow, similar to what an encased light source would look like, with soft corners on all points.  i could not see anything between the lights nor outside the formation of lights.  i could not see any wings, tail, body, shadowing or mist like you would expect on an airplane or helicopter.  at one point, it looked as if from the side, these rectangular lights may have had some depth to them, something like a shoebox shape.  maybe this was a formation of individual objects flying together.  (looked like something out of star wars!) the lights never blinked, pulsated, or changed color.  the sound i heard while it was near me was a wobbling, pulsating strange sound, with a slight percussion of air (???).  nothing about this sound was similar to that of a jet, prop-jet, helicopter or anything i have heard or seen in my lifetime.  it was flying perhaps about 30-40 mph, not slow, but not fast either.  as it got further away, the sound dissipated quickly, and the lights returned to looking like one, fairly large yellowish-white light flying in the sky again.

if our military has anything like this, wow!  if not, what is it??!!
content.summary: Has anyone seen anything like this - a flying "cross" of lights?

content.detailedDescription: Saturday night march 24,2012 at 11:52pm i took my dog out to do his business and i noticed right over my tree in burbank wa. and at about the same hight as small air plain would fly was a 8'-10' glass ball with what looked like a ark welder in it but it was putting off orange-red light instead of white. it was traveling east 100 degees at about 20-30 miles an hour. too slow for an air plane unless it was an ultralite but this ball put off so much light that it would have illuminated any craft around it. i knew no one would believe me without evidence so i ran back into the house and grabbed my video camera and got 5 min. of video of it going away from me until it went out of sight. it's an analog hi-8 and i have been trying to find someone that can put it on a dvd so i can upload it on the internet. i have talked to our air port and they said that they would not have record of radar because they shut down at 10:00pm. a few days later doing the same thing with the dog i saw a white orb come out of burbank hights arleens addition across the river towards finley wa. it was traveling very low and like a rocket. i haven't seen anything move that fast. it moved so fast i didn't even have time to turn on the camea i was holding. the object that i did get video of was right over me and it was putting out so much light that it actually would hurt your eyes if you stared at it to long. i had my camera in night vision mode so that it would film it at night so it looks white-green on film but it was really orange-red and maybe a hint of yellow. i didn't have time to grab my tripod so it's a bit shaky. i ran over to my fence and tried to stabilize the camera but it still moves around on the screen.
content.summary: It looked like a 8'-10' glass ball with an ark welder in it putting out orange-red light. i got 5 minutes of video.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving south, i noticed a 'z' pattern white streak in the sky looking to the southeast. the streak was not a straight line, but a slanted 'z' shape. then i noticed an identical white streak more to the south of the first one that was literally identical from my perspective.  they were at approximately the same elevation and distance from me but i would estimate over a mile apart. at this time, i stopped my car along side of the road so i could open my window and see them without looking through my windshield. sure enough, they were there and after rubbing my eyes, thinking i was seeing double, they still were there clear as day, although the sky was pitch black, and the sun has not casted light on the sky (literally still pitch black sky) and not one cloud could be visible since it was pitch black.
they did not move, blink, flash or anything, they were simply there.
i started to think could it be the sun shinning on extremely high altitude clouds? could it be a vapor trail??
after all i have seen in my past, and knowing that it was not easy to explain, this could not be either one.
as i continued to drive, glancing up when i could, i noticed the first one changed. the middle part of the 'z'was extremely brighter and had like a haze around the line, like it was glowing extremely bright and casting light off of moisture in the air. i didnt notice the second one changing at all but both 'z' shape forms were both still visible. eventually i notice that the seem to disapate as time went on. all this took place for approximately 10-15 minutes. i'm not sure how long before 515am they were there, but before 530am it was over.

i do not have any evidence, i was more curious to find out if anyone else saw this and if there is a reason or explanation to what it was.
content.summary: Unusual white streaks of light in dark sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have witnessed this 'same' light four times over the last year (two times in 2011, and two times in 2012).  the 2012 sightings were  yesterday, march 26, 2012, and again this morning; march 27, 2012.

at first glance, the light appears like it could 'possibly' be a very strong landling light of a plane/ however, after living near reagan national airport for years, i'm familiar with flight patterns and the overall look of landing and airplanes taking off.  

this light initially appeared like a small star, then got brighter and brighter.  i was approximately 1 mile south of the pentagon heading north on 395 towards pentagon city on my way to work.  both times i saw it, the light more or less got a little brighter, then a little dimmer - then 'bigger'.  then it got smaller, and smaller, and smaller in a smooth transition to a pinpoint of light.  then this morning, i 'thought' i saw a dark shape after the light went out that resembled two radar (convex) pieces back to back.  but at this point, the shape was extremely small.

the light appeared to be over washington national airport in dc, from my view from 395. each time i saw it, it did the same thing, then my view would be obstructed by trees for a few seconds, then i could not see anything in the sky after that.

i put only one witness below, but there 'had' to be others who noticed, as the light was 'very' bright.
content.summary: 'extremely' bright light - was not an airplane/helicopter, etc.

content.detailedDescription: We saw a light flashing in the southern sky ,i gt the binocolars and both me and my husband saw an object with colored lights flashing erraticly,no pattern at all it stayed in place we tryed to film it and got some film but the distance was appox 20 miles away
content.summary: We saw a light flashing in the souther sky ,i gt the binocolars and both me and my husband saw an object with colored lights flashing erraticly,no pattern at all it stayed in place we tryed to film it and got some film but the distance was appox 20 miles

content.detailedDescription: It was 4 am in stockport walking home from a friends with my girlfriend half way home we were watching the sars and suddenly we noticed a flashing star we soon realised it wasn't we watch for 5 minutes as it started to move toward and away in a circular motion from another object after about 10 minutes it stared pulsating faster with an aura around the original light after about 10 more minutes it seemed to literally shoot off away from earth.
content.summary: Pulsating light with aura around it moving quickly around another object

content.detailedDescription:
On september 1, 2010, i arrived home after work around 6pm.  i went to the backyard and noticed a flock of small yellowish birds on the tree.  there must have been about 75 ��� 100 of them.  i had never seen these birds much less a flock of them hanging out on our tree.  i was amazed and amused at the same time.  i was thinking how beautiful they were when suddenly i noticed this white cylinder object just moving ever so smoothly and softly above the treetop.  it was gently moving horizontally towards the south.  it was a cloudless, sky blue, sunny day and this object was quite visible.  i noticed no noise, no trail of smoke behind it.  it had no lights at all; it had a perfect square in the center like a window but with no glass.  i was astounded by the sight and could not believe what i was seeing.  i could not move at all.  i was mesmerized by this object.  i did not video even though my video cam and camera was within 15 feet of my presence.  my daughter was about 25 feet away from me and i did not even call her to come and witness what i was seeing.  no thought of anything came into mind about videoing, calling someone, nothing of that sort.   i was just in awe following the white, cylinder object until i could see it no more.  
if you go to youtube.Com and type in white cylinder ufo, you can see what i���m talking about.  the video with the electrical lines going across on the video shows a better description of what i saw.  this is not my video but shared by someone else on youtube.  i���m merely just showing that i saw an object very similar to that one.  this way you have an idea or know what i���m talking about at least.
content.summary: Cylinder white object with center square slightly popped out; it flew so soft and smoothly.

content.detailedDescription: I was out at approximately around;1-2-am.I'm a late night person,due to the hour i've woked for yrs.So i water the lawn late at night,and always peir up at the stars.In colorado,you always see somthing moving around,unexplainable....This particular evening it was summer,a nice clear night,like a mirror clear.Then something came into view from the west which caught my eye.So i looked over at this lighted item.I looked at it ,again,and more intensly due to it seemed to be coming towards me,and it seemed to be spinning!Well at this time i dropped the hose,ran into the house and grabbed my camera-this was a digital camera-lumix-12 x zoom-25-mm-wide angled.So when i came back outside...It was still right where i left it.So i set my camera onto night time photo-started zooming in,and then the object started towards the mountain range.It was still obviously hoovering!I thought man this has to be a helicopter?But i've seen many helicopters flying around in colorado springs....Many times,at any time of day or night.This was not one of them,nor a plane due to the obvious hoover motion,and it was'nt hoovering like perfect,it was moving like eradicly from side to side,and up and down.So i started snaping the pics,it was closer to the mountain peaks by this time,so i was losing sight.Except for the bright spinning lights.So i snapped one photo after another,and thiese are what i saw when i downloaded them.This was the smallest ufo i've seen in the area.The largest one{ no photo of course}was around greenland colorado{between colo.Spgs.And denver.Basicly one of the remote highway areas through the front range.This was was city size....Several of us comuters pulled over to see this move over us.Around 11-11:30-pm.Full moon,clear night.The entire object was like a bunring cigar underneath as it moved very quickly over our heads with not one sound...
content.summary: From my front yrd.Toward the mountain front range.Which is apprx.8,000-ft elev.&-10-15-mi.From me-

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i saw a glowing disc dessend into a cornfield at the junction of rt.29 and rt.136 at 2:30 on a monday morning,it freaked my wife out and she would not allow me to go into the field to check it out.I have encountered ufo"s three times,once as described above ,once in tennesse,and once here in colorado.
we are not alone,thank god,it would be awful to think we are the only ones.
content.summary: My wife and i were returning home when we saw this bright disc desend into a cornfield

content.detailedDescription:
This is the very short version of this particular experience out of many. 

i was sitting on a picnic bench to the north this time waiting to see a ufo again. you could hear a very large helicopter over the east ridge, but never saw it. shortly after, at about 1832 as i looked up to south, there it was a very bright white star like object. i have seen this before on numerous occasions. it moved in closer towards me and hovered. we looked at each other for a bit, and then it started to back up slowly and then started to flash colors of red, orange, yellow and white. in my binoculars it looks like a bunch of lights, and no real shape to it. it appeared as though alot of big diamonds were being shone upon and it created intense light play. beautiful colors. it began moving to the south towards the small ridge behind the boyscout camp and headed directly into the trees towards the top. as i watched it with the binoculars, it flew directly into the top of the ridge in the trees. as it did, there were spinning lights then it diappeared. 

i did document this sighting with videos and pictures. there are amazing things that were caught that my human eye did not catch. 

the second ufo i would see inside of my truck upon my return from this sighting. i caught an orange orb/round object ufo way out towards the west over the ocean at the edge of the sandbar. at least 1/2 mile out. it became more intense white and orange as it moved very slowly over the ocean. it would bob around, and then just stop and hover off and on. during this time the geese were screaming like something was choking them to death. i have never heard geese make this noise in my 42 years living in alaska. this object started to move faster and the same color of lights and sequence it portrayed as the last ufo sighting only moments before. it headed south towards the same area where the other ufo flew directly into the ridge. however, this one just disappeared over the river before the ridge. 

i hung out for a bit longer then headed home about 1930ish.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed very white star like ufo...Hover, move, take off on usual path. flashing colors then headed directly into trees on top of ridge. could see lights spiraling and flashing then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en el patio de la casa y tome la foto al cielo. cuando vi la foto en la pantalla de la camara pense que eran dos estrellas pues sali al patio a tomar la foto pensando que con la camara podia captar las estrellas, enseguida tome mas fotos pero hay medi cuenta que no salia nada solo oscuridad entonces me centre en ver la que aparecian las luces, pero cuando aumente la imagen para ver mejor medi cuenta que no eran las estrellas si no otra cosa; dos figuras para mi desconacidas las baje al computador y desde entonces quiero saber que es.
content.summary: Dos imagenes una con forma de orbe multicolor y la otra con una forma alargada con puntas

content.detailedDescription: Just standing outside saying goodbye to friend when we noticed the ufo in the night sky
content.summary: Outline ufo almost same color as night sky

content.detailedDescription: My friend was out side takeing video of the dry lighting storm in the foot hills saw a bright dot appear and stay for a sec then called me to grab my camera which is a sanyo vpc-e2100 with 21x optical zoom. so we got this wierd set of glowing orbs or balls on video and would like to try and get a unbiased opion of what is is or may be. i was on my front porch and my friend was in his yard
content.summary: Light appered in sky while filming dry lighting storm

content.detailedDescription:
A few weeks ago, my 11 year old daughter wanted to take some pictures of the sunset.  she was sitting in the back seat of our suburban with my wife���s i-phone.  she took several pictures. on 3-25-12 my wife decided to go thought some photos and delete some to free up space.  the first few pictures showed nothing, this one showed something???  then a few more photos of nothing.  no one saw this until the photo was reviewed??   what do you think?   

jason mahoney
greeley colorado
content.summary: See photo

content.detailedDescription: We observed a light at least 2-5 miles up the same size and brightness of a star cross the sky in about 90 seconds. an airplane was moving west to east at the same time moving about 1/4 the speed of this object.
content.summary: Star sized light crossed visible sky n. to s.  in ~90 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I have had 2 very close encounters and 1 as
well that i witnessed over my area where i live. i would report these but
it's easier to explain. the first sighting occurred in august just before
school started it was 11:11 at night and me and my 2 friends were sky
watching on st.Pete beach when we didnt c anything we started to look down
and our breaths were taken away as we saw this blue orb coming towards the
beach and it stoped just above where the waves were breaking on the
shoreline and as we looked underneath it we saw this small almost glass like
child sized figure and it paced the beach for about 15 yards till one of us
spoke to see if the others were seeing it and it froze where it was and
looked at us and the hole time the orb was above it... but as we saw it turn
towards our direction the orb strobes 3 times so bright that it was
unbelievable and after the light it was just gone... and we were scared
shitless, we sprinted all the way to my car and went straight home & i never
remember running that fast in my entire life. then the second sighting
happened when it was me and my same friend from the 1st sighting (mike) he
by the way is always there too. we this time were sky watching at jungle
prada and we witnessed these massive orange orbs that came from no where and
at first there were just 2 the a 3rd showed up in the blink of an eye. they
hovers rotated and flew over the area we realized was the first place we saw
the child figure and blue orb ( st. pete beach). this all happened for
ruffly 4 minutes till the orbs just dispersed. then my next sighting
occurred ���in seminole and this is the one that terrifies me to the core of
my being... me mike and 2 of my other friends had just pulled up at a bridge
near osceola high school and we were waiting for another kid to show up. and
once again right around 11 my friend mike and i noticed that every thing was
earily quite and the street lights started to just turn on and off but we
thought that was normal. but then they started going all spastic then they
just stoped and right as mike looked down at his phone to say "weird it's
11:11" a very loud rustle and thump came from the waters edge and i locked
eyes with a massive being that was 7 to 9 feet tall skinny, slender and it
was dragging a massive bag. one that looked like u put a christmas tree in
but what terrified me were its pure white glowing florescent eyes and then
dipped under the bridge... tears still come to my eyes when i talk about
this and i'm absolutely serious that i had to draw it to just get it off my
mind because it was just burned into me as an image
content.summary: Struck me with a sense of unknowing and fear

content.detailedDescription:
Location: naples-aerial location was north of the naples airport.
approx date & time: nov of 2009, 10:30 am, very clear morning after a cool front moved in, visibility unlimited and no clouds.
observation:
while driving home from morning errands, drove into lakewood blvd., very slow speed limit of 25mph, i observed three objects in the sky, two where planes, very common occurrence, the third object was not. i saw the object as clear as the planes but the object lacked wings and airspeed was negligible.
the object was white, very white if that makes any sense, rectangular and on the surface of the object where some geometrical shapes, like rectangular with a slight shadow from the angle of the sun on the whole object. after noticing this object was not a plane, balloon or space station (way too close for that), i stopped the car got out and the object disappeared right in front of my eyes after another 15 seconds, without a blink. the distinct effect i saw was a white blur as the object disappeared. i would say the acceleration happened 1/8 of second. absolutely incredible! i feel 100% that this wasn���t a human observation error. i am a believer of scientific evidence and thinking process.

please let me know if anyone has seen such an object.
content.summary: The object was white rectangular, then object disappeared right in front of my eyes, white blur as the object disappeared. acceleration was ¼ of second.

content.detailedDescription:
About 10:00pm i had the back door open and just happen to walk by and noticed some lights in the south that looked out of place, so i walked out on the back deck and noticed these 3 lights spaced like a triangle but almost on a vertical plane and not horizontal.It was over my neighbors house to the south, i called to my wife because i could not believe what i was seeing. my wife stepped out on the deck, i asked her do you see that? she said yes what the heck is that. i said i don't know? she said should we get the binoculars, i agreed and told her to go get them i was not taking my eyes off this thing. then i noticed intermittent flashing lights behind this triangle traveling about the speed of a helicopter. these navigation lights were following this floating triangle. we could not tell if the triangle was solid or translucent because of the angle with the horizon. with the binoculars i could see more clearly the flashing navigation lights and could tell they were not a plane because it was moving to slow. about this time the whole thing became obscured because of the street light behind my house. 
i have never been witness to anything like this before and i am still trying to wrap my mind around what we observed. i have no answers only more questions but would like someone to explain to us what we witnessed. what was strange was that we live under a couple of flight paths for mci and some smaller airports in the area and there was no planes in that area until after the objects had moved out of sight. then we started getting flight traffic again. which is unusual for that time of night because we spend a lot of time on our deck.
this is the first time i have ever thought about putting anything in writing for fear of ridicule, but i know what i witnessed and cannot explain it. i have witnessed satellites and meteors before.  it just does'nt make sense.
content.summary: Viewed 3 evenly spaced lights (triangle)moving in a southwesterly direction with 3 navagation lights following it

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work (684 south in ny - near katonah) at about 5 am (est) when i noticed two white balls of light surrounded by a white glow traveling downward very slowly. they were leaving a trail of light behind them. i thought i was seeing things. then they did something really odd,  they changed directions (it seemd like they were doing a dance.). not just once but numerous times. they were very erratic. they fell for a while and then shot back upward then back down at another angle leaving a trail of white light behind. i pulled over to look and other cars started to pull over as well, so i knew i wasn't seeing things. they were making lightning shaped patterns in the sky. i have never seen anything like this. it was amazing yet terrifying at the same time. all i kept saying is "what the hell is that?" i wonder if anyone saw these things. unfortunately i couldn't get a picture of it. the glow was too dim by the time i got pulled over to the side of the road. has anyone out there seen this? it was freaky!!!
content.summary: Two white lights leaving a white trail in the sky

content.detailedDescription: The photo was taken some time ago. me and at least 2 friends where out looking to take photos of the incoming lightning storm. we went to a vantage point overlooking glasgow. i had tacken several shoots this day. it was only yesterday that i was going over the photos i have on my hard drive to delete and edit through what i have. "this was to clear up space and to prep my portfolio" on finding these shots i put the image in to photoshop as i wanted to get a clearer look at the image on the left hand side in the clouds. i can say there is no way it could be an known aircraft.1st thing is the size, then the faint out line. the order of the lights are not what i am awaire of as standard confirurations. it had me more than a little shocked at what i think i maywell be seeing. in ps i was doing colour correction contrast changes to see if it would make the image any clearer. it does show a little better. the 2 photos i have attached are both without any edit what so ever. as this was a find long after the photo what taken i cant say what it was doing or anything about the motion of it. if i had seen it i would have got much beter shoots of it.
content.summary: Very long at least 5 lights on exterior
